about-me.Description: I am a dedicated and passionate software engineering student, focused on expanding my knowledge and skills in the technology field. My main focus is on web and application development, with a strong proficiency in the Front-end area. I have a solid understanding of the languages and technologies used in this area, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am constantly updating myself with the latest trends and frameworks. In addition, I have skills and experience in handling back-end and database aspects, which allows me to have a complete vision of software development. My goal is to contribute to the development of innovative and efficient technological solutions, using my skills in both front-end and back-end.
